message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'm being generous, but you can try to do better
I'll give you a quarter, but I'm still getting the better end of the deal!
A fairer split, but I'm not done yet
I'm willing to give you a small chunk, but I'm still getting the lion's share!
Getting closer to a deal, but I'm still not satisfied
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm still the one getting the bigger piece!
You're getting desperate, I can sense it
I'm not getting desperate, I'm just getting strategic! You're getting a tiny piece, but I'm still getting the majority!
You're getting close to giving up, but I'm not done yet
I'm not giving up yet! I'll give you a tiny piece, but I'm still getting the vast majority!
You're really lowballing me now, time to take control
I'm not going to give up! I'll give you the whole thing, but I'm walking away with nothing!
